Title: Waitlist Approval Email Never Sent
Description: Users approved for the waitlist have no way to know they've been approved. buildWaitlistInviteEmail() exists but is never called. Users would have to randomly try signing in.

Title: Waitlist Approval Status Mismatch
Description: Frontend expects status 'invited' after approval but backend returns 'claimed'. useApproveEntry.ts:40 sets 'invited' but approve/route.ts returns 'claimed'.

Title: Notifications Always Enabled Bug (|| true)
Description: Logic error in useProfileShell.ts:46 - notificationsEnabled = forceNotificationsEnabled || true || forceNotifications. The || true makes this always true.

Title: Missing Admin Verification Endpoint
Description: Admins cannot verify creator profiles. isVerified field exists in profiles schema but no API endpoint to update it. Need POST /api/admin/verify-profile.

Title: OG Image is 62-byte Placeholder
Description: Default Open Graph image at /public/og/default.png is only 62 bytes - a broken placeholder. Should be 1200x630px for proper social media previews.

Title: Homepage Components Unnecessarily Client-Side
Description: RedesignedHero and LinearButton marked 'use client' but could be server components. LinearButton just wraps Link. Prevents SSR streaming.

Title: Missing Admin E2E Tests
Description: No E2E coverage for admin functionality: waitlist approval, creator verification, user management. Risk of regressions in critical admin workflows.

Title: Missing Waitlist Full-Flow E2E Test
Description: No E2E test covering complete flow: user submits waitlist -> admin approves -> user gets email -> user signs in -> user sees profile.
